patterns_discovered: Comprehensive screen verification pattern using multiple indicators
Tree-based navigation testing with before/after state comparison
Selector-based widget interaction using keys and types
Error handling with graceful degradation (e.g., empty todo lists)
Multi-step test approach with clear logging and status tracking
gotchas_discovered: Back button only appears when on non-Home screens (navigation state dependency)
Todo list might be empty after navigation, requiring graceful handling
Widget tree comparison doesn't always prove navigation occurred
Multiple indicators needed to reliably detect screen changes
API response parsing complexity with nested JSON structures

approach_outcome.test_coverage: excellent - covers navigation path, screen detection, widget accessibility, and state comparison
approach_outcome.maintainability: good - modular steps with clear separation of concerns

recommendations: Consider adding assertion thresholds for widget count differences
Implement retry logic for UI state transitions
Add screen-specific helper methods to reduce code duplication
Consider using screen detection constants for better maintainability
Add timing configuration parameters for wait states
